cards.rules_text2: Until end of turn, if a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard, exile it instead. Whenever a creature card is exiled this way, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

cards.rules_text: Creatures you control gain indestructible and vigilance until end of turn.
Search your library for a permanent card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.
cards.rules_text2: Return up to one permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.rules_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Each opponent gets a poison counter.
cards.rules_text2:
Proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
Draw a card.
